question: The process of doing something again and again, usually to improve it.
A method of coming up with alternative solutions.
Someone who wants to know how and why things work. They also design and build things.
Engineers are people who design and build things to solve _____
This person searches for answers to technological and natural questions to obtain knowledge of why something is the way it is.
Once you've figured out what problem you want to tackle, you need to _____
The standards that help engineers measure how well their design does its job.
When engineers are trying to solve a problem, they follow a series of _____
The process of taking something apart and analyzing its workings in detail.
A simple machine that allows you to test your design.
A plan produced to show the workings of an object before it is built or made is known as?
A limit imposed on a design solution.
